definition: A facial feature typically found on adult males, consisting of hair that grows on the lower part of the face, specifically on the chin and cheeks. It is commonly groomed, styled, or shaved according to personal preference and cultural norms. This term is often used to refer to the hair itself, as well as the overall appearance or style created by it.
